name: ws-test2
description: Created a simple chat application using native WebSockets in Node.js without any external libraries. This project demonstrates how to set up a WebSocket server and client for real-time communication. THis is the task given to me during my internship to research WebSockets.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "green,blue" "cd server && bun run dev" "cd client && bun run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "server,client" -c "green,blue" "cd server && bun run start" "cd client && bun run dev"
